pages.text: Through $(l:apotheosis:enchanting/table/infusion)Infusion Enchanting$(), charms can be made Unbreakable.$(p)Through this, you can have unlimited duration of any potion effect.
The infusion recipe for Unbreakable charms is rather difficult.$(p)You'll need a firm understanding of $(l:apotheosis:enchanting/table/stats)Enchanting Stats$() to be able to complete it.
